settings.title: We know laser cutting machines
settings.text: We have a team of highly skilled and professionally trained laser technicians to train your machine operators and help you maintain your fiber-cutting machines right here in the USA.

settings.title: We don't break your budget
settings.text: We are proud to offer the best value possible across the entire laser metal fabrication industry with an unbeatable price-match guarantee offer.

settings.title: Top-notch financing options
settings.text: Get your machines right now without a hefty initial investment. Take advantage of our competitive rates and simple online financing options that take mere minutes to complete.

settings.title: We understand your unique needs
settings.text: From dual shuffle beds and enclosed coverings to tube-cutting features, our engineers can customize the perfect metal-cutting machine that fits your business's niche operations.

settings.title: Local US-based customer support
settings.text: Every FC machine purchase is accompanied by a lifetime US-based technical support team, which means you will have access to an English-speaking representative from our team of technicians.

settings.title: On-site machine installation and training
settings.text: All FC machine purchases will also come with complimentary installation and machine training. We will teach you how to operate and maintain your machines so you can get cutting right away.
